attributes.action: Put young offenders in the Army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please please do something about this crime and violence, that's taking away everything that was good about our country. If there is no room in the prisons, send the offenders to the army where they can learn a skill, whilst they are putting something back into their country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
